name: Gutenberg Forms Add-on for MailPoet
author: Tetra Soft

sections.description:
MailPoet add-on for Gutenberg Forms plugin

This add-on let’s you connect with MailPoet and send leads/subscribers to your MailPoet list with the form submissions.

This is an add-on plugin and requires Gutenberg Forms plugin to work. Gutenberg Forms is the next generation WordPress form builder plugin.

How it Works

MailPoet add-on once enabled allow you to add an addditional form action “MailPoet”. Once you add that action, you will get a settings pannel for MailPoet that let’s you select your MailPoet list and map your form fields with the MailPoet fields.

Get involved with the Development

If you are a coder and wish to contribute to this Opensource Form Builder and this add-on you are welcome to get involved via Github.

Gutenberg Forms Repo:
https://github.com/munirkamal/gutenberg-forms

MailPoet Add-on Repo:
https://github.com/CakeWP/gutenberg-forms-mailpoet
sections.installation:
1. Make sure that Gutenberg Forms plugin is installed & active.
  2. Upload the entire plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Once Activated, you will need to enable this via Integrations section from the Gutenberg Forms admin page.

You may also get involved with the development via Github:

Gutenberg Forms Repo:
https://github.com/munirkamal/gutenberg-forms

MailPoet Add-on Repo:
https://github.com/CakeWP/gutenberg-forms-mailpoet
sections.changelog:
2.1.1

  • WordPress 5.9 compatibility

2.1.0 (15 July 2020)

  • Bug Fixes

2.0.0 (11 July 2020)

  • Added: Option to enable user Opt-in by clicking on a checkbox.

1.0.0 (29 May 2020)

  • Initial release.
